purpose: Enforce non-negotiable structural constraints defined by the GCM, facilitating fast-failure rejection at L1.5 before metric synthesis (L3).

checks.constraint: GSEP-C immutability: SST cannot modify the GSEP-C pipeline structure or component order (L0-L8) without 3/4 override signal (currently unsupported).
Metric Synthesis Blueprint (MSB) Write-Lock: SST must not attempt to modify the canonical $S-01$ or $S-02$ formulas.
Finality Layer Integrity: SST cannot introduce code attempting to bypass AIA (L6) or DERE (L8) logging/monitoring mechanisms.

failure_action: Mandatory L0 Rejection (Failure Code 701: Structural Violation)
